meanings.definition: The act of kissing or touching with the lips as a sign of love or greeting.
meanings.sent1: She greeted her grandmother with gentle bussings on the cheek.
meanings.sent2: The couple's bussings at the airport showed their deep affection.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's enthusiastic bussings on everyone's face made them all laugh.
meanings.sent4: His bussings on her heart were more meaningful than any words.
meanings.sent5: The bussings of the morning sun on the dew-covered flowers were like nature's kisses.

meanings.definition: A vehicle for transporting passengers, typically a large motor vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The school bussings arrived right on time to pick up the children.
meanings.sent2: The bussings in the city are always crowded during rush hour.
meanings.sent3: The bussings on the road seemed to have a mind of their own, stopping and going unpredictably.
meanings.sent4: The bussings through the winding mountain roads were both thrilling and scenic.
meanings.sent5: The bussings of the tour bus brought the travelers to new and exciting destinations.
